/* Filters used when retrieving the cart rules applied to a cart of when calculating the value of a reduction */
/* This variable controls that a free gift is offered only once, even when multi-shippping is activated and the same product is delivered in both addresses */

/** * Copy conditions from one cart rule to an other * * @static * @param int $id_cart_rule_source * @param int $id_cart_rule_destination */

/** * @static * @param $id_lang * @param $id_customer * @param bool $active * @param bool $includeGeneric * @param bool $inStock * @param Cart|null $cart * @return array */

scalar:array.comment: /* This loop checks: - if the voucher is already in the cart - if a non compatible voucher is in the cart - if there are products in the cart (gifts excluded) Important note: this MUST be the last check, because if the tested cart rule has priority over a non combinable one in the cart, we will switch them */

/* This loop checks: - if the voucher is already in the cart - if a non compatible voucher is in the cart - if there are products in the cart (gifts excluded) Important note: this MUST be the last check, because if the tested cart rule has priority over a non combinable one in the cart, we will switch them */

scalar:array.comment: // Discount (%) on the whole order

// If we need to convert the voucher value to the cart currency
// First we convert the voucher value to the default currency
// Then we convert the voucher value in the default currency into the cart currency
// Then we convert the voucher value in the default currency into the cart currency
// If it has the same tax application that you need, then it's the right value, whatever the product!
// The reduction cannot exceed the products total, except when we do not want it to be limited (for the partial use calculation)
// Discount () on the whole order
// The reduction cannot exceed the products total, except when we do not want it to be limited (for the partial use calculation)
// Free gift
// The free gift coupon must be applied to one product only (needed for multi-shipping which manage multiple product lists)
